code: import BigNumber from'bignumber.js';export var BIG_ZERO=new BigNumber(0);export var BIG_ONE=new BigNumber(1);export var BIG_NINE=new BigNumber(9);export var BIG_TEN=new BigNumber(10);export var ethersToSerializedBigNumber=function ethersToSerializedBigNumber(ethersBn){return ethersToBigNumber(ethersBn).toJSON();};export var ethersToBigNumber=function ethersToBigNumber(ethersBn){return new BigNumber(ethersBn.toString());};
